file_content.text: [The thawing controls are drained of power.]
[You have found the carbonite-thawing controls. A status readout warns that it is cut off from the main generator.]
[Remaining power is only sufficient to thaw one grid of prisoners. There are two here.]
[Grid 1 houses murderers with diagnosed criminal pathologies. They're likely to kill guards and other prisoners if released, which could spark an escalating war.]
[Grid 2 houses agitators of large-scale protests and riots. They're likely to organize revolts if released, possibly with less violence.]
[What would you like to do?]
A few psychopaths should keep the Republic awake at night.
[Thaw the murderers]
[Energy diverted to Grid 1.]
Nothing like a rebellion to shake things up.
[Thaw the agitators]
[Energy diverted to Grid 2.]
I hope you're proud. Your time on Belsavis is up.
You speak that way to a Sith Lord?
Insolent words, lawman.
I'd speak this way to the Emperor himself if the coward dared show his face.
I've been cracking heads twenty years this spring. Every Sith I've downed thought the law never applied to him.
You don't have a clue who you're talking to.
I'm way better than you think.
I've seen bounty hunters come and go, each believing they were the baddest boots in the galaxy.
I've got a wall of helmets in my den that says otherwise.
Sharp words from someone unfamiliar with my talents.
You know nothing.
You think I can't smell Imperial Intelligence all over you?
I've been with the law twenty years this spring. I've seen it all.
My time's never up.
This isn't a case of where we agree to disagree. Not while you're still on this planet.
You have anything to back that up?
Says who?
Listen close. I've been serving reality to slime like you for near twenty years.
So let me make this perfectly clear. You've made a mistake. Time to pack up and fly home.
You can't scare me off, Ruger. I'm here to stay.
Never.
I'll enjoy throwing your stubborn carcass in jail.
What mistake?
Mistake?
You got my attention.
Your act isn't working, Ruger.
You'll learn. They all do.
